name: gaia online add color to guild forum navbar
description: adds color to the guild navbar. you can use with all other programs or scripts and it won't conflict at all. dont like the color blue? change the color to something else, just remember to only alter the code where it says blue
css:
/* i really want this to be global */
.cta-button-xsm.disabled span,
.cta-button-sm.disabled span,
.cta-button-md.disabled span,
.cta-button-lg.disabled span,
.cta-button-xlg.disabled span,
.cta-dropdown-sm.disabled span,
.cta-dropdown-md.disabled span,
.cta-dropdown-sm-label.disabled,
.cta-dropdown-md-label.disabled {
	color: blue;
}
#content a.cta-button-xsm,
#content a.cta-button-sm,
#content a.cta-button-md,
#content a.cta-button-lg,
#content a.cta-button-xlg,
#content a.cta-dropdown-sm,
#content a.cta-dropdown-md,
#content a.cta-dropdown-sm-label,
#content a.cta-dropdown-md-label,
#gaia_content #bd a.cta-button-xsm,
#gaia_content #bd a.cta-button-sm,
#gaia_content #bd a.cta-button-md,
#gaia_content #bd a.cta-button-lg,
#gaia_content #bd a.cta-button-xlg,
#gaia_content #bd a.cta-dropdown-sm,
#gaia_content #bd a.cta-dropdown-md,
#gaia_content #bd a.cta-dropdown-sm-label,
#gaia_content #bd a.cta-dropdown-md-label {
	color: blue;
}
.cta-button-sm.disabled,
.cta-button-sm.blue-button {
	background-position: right -284px;
}
